thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Chegg Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.03

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chegg Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.03
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Chegg Inc:
* CHEGG REPORTS Q4 AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND RAISES 2018 GUIDANCE
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $295 MILLION TO $300 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $73 MILLION TO $75 MILLION * QTRLY TOTAL NET REVENUES OF $73.5 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF 17% YEAR-OVER-YEAR
* QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.03 * SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA IN RANGE OF $14 MILLION TO $16 MILLION
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES IN RANGE OF $30 MILLION TO $35 MILLION
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA IN RANGE OF $74 MILLION TO $76 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.13, REVENUE VIEW $70.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.08 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $71.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $295.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
